name: Zombies Killer - Top Zombie Shooting Game
name_original: Zombies Killer - Top Zombie Shooting Game
description:
Get dropped into the middle of the Zombies Hunter chaos! PLAY TO SURVIVE!

THE MOST EXCITING ZOMBIE SHOOTER EVER

Featuring 25 visceral levels, intense combat, engaging puzzles, upgradable weapons , and boss mode. The Zombies Hunter game challenges you: play to survive.

• Over a dozen upgradeable weapons
• 5 challenging bosses
•Over 40 different achievements
• Chilling tense atmosphere
• Multiple forms of combat including hand-to-hand and ranged shooting
• Zombie Hordes

Happy and have fun with Zombies Hunter!!
